componentTest.name: Gas Valve
componentTest.equipment: Digital multimeter (AC Volts & Ohms); Insulated probes
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF, gas OFF
2. Disconnect valve
3. Measure resistance: 2.8-4.5kΩ
4. Reconnect, power ON
5. Measure voltage: 230V AC
6. Listen for click
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Correct resistance; 230V; Audible click | FAIL: OL/short; No voltage; Silent
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ GAS SAFE ONLY; 230V SHOCK HAZARD; Gas leak risk

componentTest.name: NTC Thermistor
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF
2. Disconnect thermistor
3. Measure at room temp: ~10kΩ
4. Warm with hand: drops to 7-8kΩ
5. Check cable continuity
componentTest.passFail: PASS: 9.7-10.3kΩ @ 25°C; Drops when warmed | FAIL: OL/short; No change
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ Power OFF; System may be HOT

componentTest.name: Pressure Sensor/Switch
componentTest.expectedVoltage: Sensor: 5V DC supply, 0.5-4.5V signal | Switch: N/A
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF
2. Locate pressure component
3. Test sensor voltage at different pressures
4. Test switch continuity at >1 bar
5. Verify operation
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Sensor voltage changes with pressure; Switch closes >0.8bar | FAIL: Stuck readings; Always open/closed
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ 230V AC present; System pressurized; Power OFF before work

componentTest.name: Fan Motor
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF
2. Check spins freely
3. Measure resistance: 100-500Ω
4. Power ON
5. Measure voltage: 230V AC
6. Fan starts within 5s
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Spins freely; Correct resistance; 230V; Runs | FAIL: Seized; OL; No voltage
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ 230V SHOCK; Spinning blades
